con:setting.id: HTTP tunnel - Set SSL Client Key Store path
HTTP tunnel - Set SSL Client Key Store Password

con:method.name: stored_whois_get
con:method.con:description: Get a whois entry by its id

con:parameter.con:name: id
con:parameter.con:description: Id of the incoming whois entry

con:method.name: incoming_get
con:method.con:description: Get a incoming whois entry by its id

con:method.name: whitelist_get
con:method.con:description: Get a whitelist entry by its id

con:method.name: whitelist_list
con:method.con:description: Returns all whitelisted domain names and IP addresses

con:parameter.con:name: domainName
con:parameter.con:description: Domain name to get information about

con:method.name: whois_domain
con:method.con:description: Returns all known info about the IP address a domain resolves to

con:parameter.con:name: ipAddress
con:parameter.con:description: IP address to get information about

con:method.name: whois_ip
con:method.con:description: Returns all known info about an IP address

con:parameter.con:name: ipAddress
con:parameter.con:description: IP address to get information about

con:method.name: geo_ip
con:method.con:description: Returns geolocation info for a given IP address

con:config.script: def stepControl = new com.nagra.StepControl(testRunner, context, log) stepControl.gotoTCMethod()
def stepControl = new com.nagra.StepControl(testRunner, context, log) stepControl.logWrongTCMethod()
def stepControl = new com.nagra.StepControl(testRunner, context, log) stepControl.checkForNextStep()
